item.title: basic-1
item.description: Sometimes we need to delete files, not only add them. But in git deleting a file means add-ing the deletion to the staging area and committing that change. ðŸ§© Hints Click on hints to reveal them.

item.title: basic-2
item.description: We can also add and delete directories from git, not only files. This level about that. ðŸ§© Hints Click on hints to reveal them.

item.title: clone
item.description: Welcome to make-git-better CTF ðŸš© Notes for beginners ðŸ§± CTF structure The level browser ðŸ¤” Unsure what to do? â–¶ I am ready to play Connect to the game server Clone the repository ðŸ§© Hints Notes for beginners ðŸ§± CTF structure This CTF, like most other CTFs, is separated into levels. You start at the “clone” level (where you are right now), and try to finish it. When you’ll finish a level, you will get some information about how to start the next one!

item.title: hooks-1
item.description: For this stage, you must run the script ./setup_hooks_stage.sh first! You need to add more than 100 files into the add_files_here directory, and you can’t do it in more than 3 commits. Shouldn’t be too hard, should it? Once you’ve solved this stage, be sure to undo what setup_hooks_stage.sh does ðŸ˜Š ðŸ§© Hints Click on the hint to see it.

item.title: hooks-2
item.description: For this stage, you must run the script ./setup_hooks_stage.sh first! Just commit something :) ðŸ§© Hints Click on the hint to see it.

item.title: log-1
item.description: The flag is in the commit message of this branch’s grandparent. ðŸ§© Hints Click on the hint to see it.

item.title: log-2

item.title: log-3
item.description: The flag is even more hidden - not in a commit message, but in the file itself! ðŸ§© Hints Click on the hint to see it.

item.title: log-4
item.description: I said a hip hop, The hippie to the hippie The hip hip a hop, and you don’t stop, a rock it To the bang bang boogie, say up jump the boogie, To the rhythm of the boogie, the beat. -Nile Rodgers / Bernard Edwards, “Rapper’s Delight” You’ll have to hop around a little to find the flag. Read the readme to start. ðŸ§© Hints Click on the hint to see it.

item.description: There’s a script called runme.py. Try to run it. Once you’re done with this level, remember to push! ðŸ§© Hints Click on hints to reveal them.

item.title: merge-3
item.description: There’s a script called runme.py. Try to run it. It works! So what’s the problem? Read the readme. You're vs Your from The Oatmeal ðŸ§© Hints Click on the hint to see it.

item.title: merge-4
item.description: There’s a script called runme.py. Try to run it. This time the conflict is a little harder, but you can solve it! ðŸ§© Hints Click on the hint to see it.

item.title: merge-5
rebase-1
item.description: This level is a little harder. Don’t panic! In this level, we have a base branch and a topic branch. The base branch is parallelizing-barnhardtite-base and the topic branch is parallelizing-barnhardtite-topic Notice the difference: ^^^^^ The base branch introduced a script called runme.py, which prints all the resources in the runme_resources/ folder. Try to run it now. In the topic branch, we will need to add specific resources. To do this, run the add_resources.

item.description: Check out the password file, and read the README. ðŸ§© Hints Click on the hint to see it.
